ygData.subject: Re: Treehuggers?
ygData.messageBody:
<<It is tree huggers like you that have made the people of Norrath weak and
allowed the races of Gnolls and Orcs to overrun the lands that were once
ours.>>

::After careful consideration, and a loud bellow, Fennris begins to write his
reply to this Patty person, and The Hands of the Tranquil in general.::

Ah, my dear barbarian woman. By "Tree-hugger", I assume you mean a Druid, as
that is what we have commonly been called. However, I must point out that no
Druid in the history of Norrath, as far as I have seen, follows the path of
Quellious The Tranquil. While I must agree with you on that the Hands of the
Tranquil have said some harsh things on many of the gods and goddesses we all
love and worship, I think it best we save this for the Gathering. It will
surely be a heated topic of debate during the Philosophy segment, and I await
the oppertunity to debate this with those members of the guild. Until then,
keep your cool and go have yourself an ale. I think the Gathering will be
successful, as long as everyone remains patient.

And as far as cleansing Norrath of all the orcs and gnolls... well give us a
chance. It's not easy. :-)

Stay safe, and good tidings!

����Fennris McKay����
����Guardian Wolf of The RainKeeper����
����The Council of Truth����

... dancin' in the rain.
